alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:49PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Logan, Phillips and Sedgwick Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 748 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Peetz to near Proctor to 7 miles south of St Petersburg, or along a line extending from 17 miles southwest of Sidney to 16 miles northeast of Sterling to 22 miles north of Yuma. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Brief heavy rain is also possible. Locations impacted include... Holyoke, Haxtun, Fleming, Ovid, Peetz, Sedgwick, Crook, Paoli, St Petersburg, Proctor, Marks Butte, Highland Center, Twin Buttes, Fairfield and Sixteen-Mile Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
